ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text())

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+万字/,'万'),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image'),

      url: og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};

book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")
</js>

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, '').replace(/^vip卷\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

bookSourceComment:
─────当前版本Pro V18─────

点击登录即可查看:

0、书源制作思路

1、版本更新日志

2、书源用法展示

3、相关问题解释

───────搜索格式────────

完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名

说明：搜索“斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”将在“www.qidian.com”中搜索名为斗破苍穹、作者为天蚕土豆的书籍

切换：关键字前加“<数字>”可将域名设置为下面列表中的其它域名：
["https://www.google.com/search?q=","https://images.hk.53yu.com/search?safe=off&hl=zh-CN&q="
,"https://www.sanzhima.com/search?q="
,"https://readmorejoy.com/search/?who=gg&start=0&key="]
其中“<0>”将域名设置为谷歌原网， 搜索格式如“<0>斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”(注：本源默认使用谷歌镜像，切换到谷歌原网时需挂VPN才能用)。

──────前缀设置全体───────

转化：关键字前加“@”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`优先考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

单页：关键字前加“!”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`搜到什么点开就是什么，不做目录识别也不做章节识别，自动为当前网页构造目录，当前网页的内容储存在“预览内容”中

跳转：关键字前加“^”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`允许目录自动跳转，目录标题中写着点击跳转时可如此做。

逆向：关键字前加“-”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`目录章节逆向排序，配合指定网站的搜索方式针对小说全是逆向排序的网站比较方便。

图文：关键字前加“|”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询文字，不查询图片。或关键字前加“_”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询图片，不查询文字。这两个前缀只能设置其一，都不设置时默认图文都查询。

──────简介设置单本───────

说明：将特定字段插入简介保存后，点刷新可实现目录跳转、目录逆向排序、目录链接指定等多种功能。

局限：修改简介再点刷新只会控制当前书籍执行指定功能，想控制所有书籍执行指定功能，请采用上面`全部设置`的方式在关键字前加相应前缀并重新搜索

位置：插入到简介最前端

格式：在“{}”中包含以下文字就会触发相应功能
─────⤵
转：尽量考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“直[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。

跳：允许目录自动跳转，目录标题说点击跳转时可如此做。

全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。

逆：设置目录章节逆向排序。

图：设置成看图模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示图片，不显示文字。

字：设置成纯字模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示文本，不显示图片。
─────⤴

示例：{直[http://m.biquku.la/0/425/]全字}

效果：①直接将“http://m.biquku.la/0/425/”作为小说目录链接②显示元素查询得到的全部章节列表，不做章节筛选③以纯文字模式查找正文内容，避免图片干扰。

──────前缀设置全体───────

转化：关键字前加“@”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`优先考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

单页：关键字前加“!”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`搜到什么点开就是什么，不做目录识别也不做章节识别，自动为当前网页构造目录，当前网页的内容储存在“预览内容”中

跳转：关键字前加“^”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`允许目录自动跳转，目录标题中写着点击跳转时可如此做。

逆向：关键字前加“-”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`目录章节逆向排序，配合指定网站的搜索方式针对小说全是逆向排序的网站比较方便。

图文：关键字前加“|”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询文字，不查询图片。或关键字前加“_”，`设置本次搜到的所有书籍`正文只查询图片，不查询文字。这两个前缀只能设置其一，都不设置时默认图文都查询。

──────简介设置单本───────

说明：将特定字段插入简介保存后，点刷新可实现目录跳转、目录逆向排序、目录链接指定等多种功能。

局限：修改简介再点刷新只会控制当前书籍执行指定功能，想控制所有书籍执行指定功能，请采用上面`全部设置`的方式在关键字前加相应前缀并重新搜索

位置：插入到简介最前端

格式：在“{}”中包含以下文字就会触发相应功能
─────⤵
转：尽量考虑将链接转化为电脑版，争取获得目录不分页的电脑版链接

直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“直[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。

跳：允许目录自动跳转，目录标题说点击跳转时可如此做。

全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。

逆：设置目录章节逆向排序。

图：设置成看图模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示图片，不显示文字。

字：设置成纯字模式(默认为图文模式)，只显示文本，不显示图片。
─────⤴

示例：{直[http://m.biquku.la/0/425/]全字}

效果：①直接将“http://m.biquku.la/0/425/”作为小说目录链接②显示元素查询得到的全部章节列表，不做章节筛选③以纯文字模式查找正文内容，避免图片干扰。

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"")
.replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

ruleContent.content:
$.returnObject[0].content@js:
result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;
    var S31 = 4,
    S32 = 11,
    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;
    var S41 = 6,
    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,
    S44 = 21;
    string = uTF8Encode(string);
    x = convertToWordArray(string);
    a = 0x67452301;
    b = 0xEFCDAB89;
    c = 0x98BADCFE;
    d = 0x10325476;
    for (k = 0; k < x.length; k += 16) {
        AA = a;
        BB = b;
        CC = c;
        DD = d;
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 0], S11, 0xD76AA478);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 1], S12, 0xE8C7B756);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 2], S13, 0x242070DB);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 3], S14, 0xC1BDCEEE);
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 4], S11, 0xF57C0FAF);

function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: md5(data.timeStamp + md5Key)
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
//搜索链接
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    content:key,
    pageSize:10,
    pageNum:1
};
getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' • '  + og('novel:update_time'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: og('description'),
  url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.name: name

 latest: String(o.lastChapterName).replace(/[\(（].*[求更谢乐发推].*[）\)]/,'')+String(java.timeFormat(Number(o.lastTime))).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
    intro:o.desc,
    cover:o.imgUrl,
    catalogUrl:'/api/bookapp/bookSummary.m?sort=1&size=2147483647&returnType=100&gsort=1&cid=eef_easou_book&os=android&appverion=1070&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&ptype=4&gid='+o.gid+'&nid='+o.nid
})).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>

//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};

    siteId: 1,

    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",

    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: md5(data.timeStamp + md5Key)
};
var cmd = "cmd="+type+"&value=" + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value));
var option = {
   "method": "POST",
   "body": String(cmd)
};
return result=url + ','+JSON.stringify(option);
}

    pageSize:10,

};

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text())

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+万字/,'万'),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('.intro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image').replace('s:',':'),

      url: og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};

book;
</js>

<js>
result=result.replace(/onclick="payChapter\('(.*?)','.*?',.*?\);"/g,'href="$1"');
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#episodes a,#extra_episodes a");
if(String(list).match(/class="price_tag_icon">￥/)){
result=list
}else{
list=doc.select("#episodes a");
list2=doc.select("#extra_episodes a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
b=list2.toArray().map(x=>({text:x.text(),
href:x.attr('href')}));
result=a.concat(b)
}</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

//返回json字符串
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"︵")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"︶")
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text())

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+万字/,'万'),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image'),

      url: og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};

book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var book = {
	name: o('h2').match(/《(.*)》.*/)[1],
	author: o('h2').match(/.*作者：(.*)首发.*/)[1],
	kind: o('.bookIntro p strong:eq(0)') + ',' + o('.bookIntro strong:eq(1)').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: o('h4 b').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1],
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1] + '\n' + o('#newIntro').replace(/\[ .*\]/, ''),
	cover: J.select('.bookPic img').attr('src'),
	url: J.select('.viewTool a:eq(0)').attr('href'),
};
book;
</js>

result=JSON.parse(result).data.comments.map(a=>"用户："+a.createrId.userName+"
评分："+a.score+" / 5"+"
时间："+a.createdAt.replace(/T.+/,"")+"
评语："+a.content.replace(/([。！？；]+[）”]?)/g,"$1\n").replace(/([0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5])$/,"$1……")+"
该评价的点赞数："+a.praiseCount).join("
——
");

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i < list.length; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第' + index + '页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text())

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('.intro').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image'),

      url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>
